# Seaborn for data visualisation

Seaborn is a Python data visualisation library based on Matplotlib. Seaborn makes it easy to create attractive and well-laid-out plots. Seaborn also plays nicely with Pandas data structures, which is important for data science task. We can install Seaborn easily using pip or conda:

```bash
# installation using pip
pip install seaborn
```
